The video has been circulating since 201: 2. The video was originally uploaded to the website Vimeo on October 16, 2014, by visual effects artist Dave Fothergill.
The video is titled: I've Fallen, and I Can't Get Up!" and was created for a "crowd dynamics test" using Miarmy for Maya.
The video is a lifelike animation and do: life event of people getting knocked over by a giant rotating bar.
